selected_quotes: #icanhazpdf to ianstrutt at gmail dot com - thanks if you can help!

citation.abstract: A vinblastine-templated library of 7-aryl-octahydroazonino[5,4-b]indoles was prepared by a three-component reaction from indolizino[8,7-b]indoles, chloroformates, and activated arenes via a chloroformate mediated fragmentation of the indolizinoindole nucleus followed by insertion of an activated arene. In addition to N3-carbamoyl-7-aryl-octahydroazonino[5,4-b]indoles prepared in one step, a wide range of N3-substituted substrates were synthesized in one pot via the derivatization of a versatile N3-H-azonino[5,4-b]indole intermediate generated in situ by application of the same strategy. A subset of 308 compounds out of a virtual library of 3216, representing 13 different chemotypes, was prepared by high throughput solution-phase synthesis and subsequently purified by mass-triggered high performance liquid chromatography (HPLC). A total of 188 compounds with a minimum purity of 80% by UV214 nm and 85% by evaporative light scattering detection (ELSD) was isolated for primary screening.
citation.title: Diversity Oriented Synthesis of a Vinblastine-Templated Library of 7-Aryl-Octahydroazonino[5,4-b]indoles via a Three-Component Reaction.

author.name: Ian Strutt
author.description: English PhD chemist, american football oficianado, and part-time foodie whose interests include lifting weights, music and moaning about life.
